module.name: Vega
module.description: This module is used to configure and manage Vega gateways
module.changelog: *15.0.12* FREEPBX-22947 Modified information panel details *15.0.11* Packaging of ver 15.0.11 *15.0.10* Packaging of ver 15.0.10 *15.0.9* Packaging of ver 15.0.9 *15.0.8* bump *15.0.7* Packaging of ver 15.0.7 *15.0.6* Fixing FREEI-1302 Adding cache logic to avoid polling vega status on every time gui load *15.0.5* Fixing auto install issue *15.0.4* FREEI-1023 *15.0.3* FREEPBX-20396 VegaGateway Leagacy Restore *15.0.2* FREEPBX-20129 backup restore done *15.0.1* Release 15.0
